name: Furious Farm: Total Reap-Out 🌾
description:
🔥🚜 Combine-Harvester Racing on Furious Farm 🏁🔥

We don’t care for a boring ol’ reapin’ here on Furious Farm. Wot we want is action! Geysers of straw! Flying tires!! FLAMES!!!

Harvest season is contest season, and hot enough to make you sweat, count on that. So hop into your combine and take the wheel, we’re looking forward to a beautiful mess of a reap-out! Hah!

🌾🌾🚜🔥🔥

🌾🌾🚜🔥🔥

Keyboard controls:

  • up/W - Accelearate
  • down/S - Go backwards
  • left/a - Steer left
  • right/d - Steer right
  • spacebar - Use power-up

Controller controls:

  • left stick - Steer
  • right stick - Accelerate / Go backwards
  • right shoulder/trigger - Use power-up

🌾🌾🚜🔥🔥

Furious Farm: Total Reap-Out is PUNKCAKE Délicieux‘s collective entry to Ludum Dare #52, Jam category! It was made entirely in under 72 hours.

Game design, Code, Graphics - Rémy Devaux
Original Soundtrack - Pentadrangle
Title screen, SFX - Benjamin Soulé

🌾🌾🚜🔥🔥

As PUNKCAKE Délicieux we make a new game every month, which you can get by subscribing to our Patreon for 3€/month or buy separately on Itch io for 6$!

We ran kinda short on time at the end for the jam, so we couldn’t quite bring the game up to par with the vision we had for it. No matter, we hope you’ll find that the result is still pretty okay, and as for us we’ll keep on working on this game for a fuller PUNKCAKE Délicieux release soon! Stay tuned!
